java/liquibase/database/structure/MySqlDatabaseSnapshot.java

00001 package liquibase.database.structure;
00002 
00003 import java.sql.ResultSet;
00004 import java.sql.SQLException;
00005 import java.sql.Statement;
00006 import java.text.ParseException;
00007 import java.util.ArrayList;
00008 import java.util.HashMap;
00009 import java.util.List;
00010 import java.util.Map;
00011 import java.util.Set;
00012 
00013 import liquibase.database.Database;
00014 import liquibase.diff.DiffStatusListener;
00015 import liquibase.exception.JDBCException;
00016 
00017 public class MySqlDatabaseSnapshot extends SqlDatabaseSnapshot {
00018         
00022         private static Map<String, Map<String, List<String>>> schemaCache = new HashMap<String, Map<String, List<String>>>();
00023         
00027     public MySqlDatabaseSnapshot () {
00028     }
00029 
00033     public MySqlDatabaseSnapshot (Database database) throws JDBCException {
00034         this(database, null, null);
00035     }
00036 
00040     public MySqlDatabaseSnapshot (Database database, String schema) throws JDBCException {
00041         this(database, null, schema);
00042     }
00043 
00047     public MySqlDatabaseSnapshot (Database database, Set<DiffStatusListener> statusListeners) throws JDBCException {
00048         this(database, statusListeners, database.getDefaultSchemaName());
00049     }
00050 
00054     public MySqlDatabaseSnapshot  (Database database, Set<DiffStatusListener> statusListeners, String requestedSchema) throws JDBCException {
00055         super (database, statusListeners, requestedSchema);
00056     }
00057     
00061     protected void getColumnTypeAndDefValue(Column columnInfo, ResultSet rs, Database database) throws SQLException, JDBCException {
00062 
00063         String columnTypeName = rs.getString("TYPE_NAME");
00064         String columnName     = rs.getString("COLUMN_NAME");
00065         String tableName      = rs.getString("TABLE_NAME");
00066         String schemaName     = rs.getString("TABLE_CAT");
00067         
00068         Map<String, List<String>> tableSchema = new HashMap<String, List<String>>();
00069         
00070         if (!schemaCache.containsKey(tableName)) {
00071                 
00072                 Statement selectStatement = database.getConnection().createStatement();
00073             ResultSet rsColumnType = selectStatement.executeQuery("DESC "+database.escapeTableName(schemaName, tableName));
00074             
00075             while(rsColumnType.next()) {
00076                 List<String> colSchema = new ArrayList<String>();
00077                 colSchema.add(rsColumnType.getString("Type"));
00078                 colSchema.add(rsColumnType.getString("Default"));
00079                 tableSchema.put(rsColumnType.getString("Field"), colSchema);
00080             }
00081             
00082             rsColumnType.close();
00083             
00084             schemaCache.put(tableName, tableSchema);
00085                 
00086         }
00087         
00088         tableSchema = schemaCache.get(tableName);
00089         
00090         // Parse ENUM and SET column types correctly
00091         if (columnTypeName.toLowerCase().startsWith("enum") || columnTypeName.toLowerCase().startsWith("set")) {        
00092 
00093                 columnInfo.setTypeName(tableSchema.get(columnName).get(0));
00094                 try {
00095                         String tmpDefaultValue = (String)database.convertDatabaseValueToJavaObject(tableSchema.get(columnName).get(1), columnInfo.getDataType(), columnInfo.getColumnSize(), columnInfo.getDecimalDigits());
00096                         if ("".equals(tmpDefaultValue)) {
00097                                 columnInfo.setDefaultValue(null);
00098                         } else {
00099                                 columnInfo.setDefaultValue(tmpDefaultValue);
00100                         }
00101                 } catch (ParseException e) {
00102                         throw new JDBCException(e);
00103                 }
00104                 
00105         // TEXT and BLOB column types always have null as default value 
00106         } else if (columnTypeName.toLowerCase().equals("text") || columnTypeName.toLowerCase().equals("blob")) {
00107                 columnInfo.setTypeName(columnTypeName);
00108                 columnInfo.setDefaultValue(null);
00109                 
00110         // Parsing TIMESTAMP database.convertDatabaseValueToJavaObject() produces incorrect results
00111         // eg. for default value 0000-00-00 00:00:00 we have 0002-11-30T00:00:00.0 as parsing result
00112         } else if (columnTypeName.toLowerCase().equals("timestamp") && !tableSchema.get(columnName).get(1).equals("CURRENT_TIMESTAMP")) {
00113                 columnInfo.setTypeName(columnTypeName);
00114                 columnInfo.setDefaultValue(tableSchema.get(columnName).get(1));
00115         } else {
00116                 super.getColumnTypeAndDefValue(columnInfo, rs, database);
00117         }
00118     }
00119 
00120     protected String convertPrimaryKeyName(String pkName) throws SQLException {
00121         if (pkName.equals("PRIMARY")) {
00122             return null;
00123         } else {
00124             return pkName;
00125         }
00126     }
00127 }
